Alignment Vertical Attributes
=============================



```
concept {
    IfcAlignmentVertical:Segments -> IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartDistAlong -> IfcLengthMeasure_0
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:HorizontalLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartHeight -> IfcLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartGradient -> IfcLengthMeasure_2
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:EndGradient -> IfcLengthMeasure_3
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:RadiusOfCurvature -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:PredefinedType -> IfcAlignmentVerticalSegmentTypeEnum
}
```
